lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: the sooner I start helping people, the better.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I want people around the world to have the same opportunities I have been given. People helping people is what make us human!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Discharge Pharmacy Tech, when a patient is given the ok to go home I will speak with patient and ask if we can fill there prescriptions and bring up to them.

lender.name: nick
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a doctor and currently working as an adventure travel guide--I take people on week-long vacations in various locations around the world.

lender.name: The James Gang
lender.loan_because: God has left us as stewards of His abundance. The money belongs to God!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am a needy college student who wants everything in the world. But when I browse Kiva I see that my life is pretty swell and that makes me partially responsible for making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending a university to become a Physician Assistant.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jessica & Eoin
lender.loan_because: Because we're lucky enough to be able to

lender.name: mfs
lender.loan_because: paying forward my family's lucky/miraculous escape from serious injury

lender.name: Daily Mantra
lender.loan_because: This project is inspirational.

lender.name: Anh
lender.occupational_info: I'll be a teacher

lender.name: The Olivers
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans are an effective way to embower communities in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 30+ lady from Finland, Europe. I am a computer professional and work for a govermental, non-profit research institute. I help in a research project which studies industrial usage of open source software (i.e. free software, such as Linux).

lender.name: Louise Karstensdotter
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help people. Thanks to Kiva and lenders, more people can be independent, making their own money, creating their own possibilities. The sky is the limit!

lender.name: Sigurlaugur Oddur
lender.loan_because: I want to help other ppl and i care
lender.occupational_info: Not Working

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to empower small business owners who wish for a better life for themselves and their families. I applaud their initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I paint landscape paintings of the Southern United States.

lender.name: oladokun
lender.loan_because: my loan is because of my business
lender.occupational_info: cybercafe

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do for the right kind of people. Hopefully the people receiving this money will make a great impact on their world. One small step for world peace...
lender.occupational_info: I am a facilities engineer for a manufacturer in the Southern US. I apply for funds by justifying a return on investment, and then use the money for improvement projects.

lender.name: Gerhard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, who want to work and try to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: working on the world wide web and build some projects like www.hall-tirol.at

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves and if we can't help each other then we are just wasting oxygen.
lender.occupational_info: I assist drivers in finding freight so that they may become more profitable.

lender.name: Oswaldo
lender.loan_because: I came from total poverty and with the hard work of my parents we now live a life that to most people in the world would seem of luxury. I believe a person who is willing to work to get ahead in life should have the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I went to college for Chemistry and graduated in 2002 but I now manage the family business in Florida.

lender.name: Max and Jennifer
lender.loan_because:
While traveling in Jamaica we were confronted with the reality of poverty in a third world country. We wanted to find some way to contribute and help people around the world. Thank you Kiva for giving us the opportunity to help. We look forward to increasing our support.
"Overcoming poverty is not a gesture of charity. It is an act of justice" - Nelson Mandela
lender.occupational_info:
Max is a Project Manager - Oversees commercial construction projects.
Jennifer is a Art Student - Studying the basics of fine arts.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I believe if we all do our part we can change the world!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Community Shares. We raise money through workplace giving for over 50 member groups that are working hard for Social Change/Justice.

lender.name: Dhanur and Shikha
lender.loan_because: we believe in the potential of microfinance to effect social change
lender.occupational_info: Logistics Banking (Commercial Lending)

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people in an emergency department, I keep chickens and sell eggs

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be on a more even level.
lender.occupational_info: Pediatrician

lender.name: The Challenge
lender.loan_because: All the members of the The Challenge are amazing people, and without them we would would have never been able to achieve this. Seriously I can't thank you enough.
lender.occupational_info: Encouraging entrepreneurship... One step at a time...

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves!

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to change someone's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at the University of Minnesota studying advertising.

lender.name: Dude
lender.loan_because: It's like what Lenin said......you look for the person who will benefit, and ,uh, uh....
lender.occupational_info: "The Dude abides". Dunno about you ,but I take comfort in those words. It's good knowin' he's out there. Takin' er easy for all us sinners .

lender.name: nottinghub
lender.loan_because: they need help

lender.name: Maffiou
lender.loan_because: it's only money to me!

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: jesus alfonso
lender.loan_because: i just think its great to be able to lend a helping hand, the key is ¨lend¨not give, that way people apprecieate much more the ¨ïmprovements¨to their property and life.
lender.occupational_info: its not easy to run a bussines, its rewarding to se it grow, makes all the risk taken woth while...big or small, just try to...

lender.name: Adrianne
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to enrich their lives and those of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I manage salaries for a major University in the USA.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: This is an incredible way to help someone whose needs are so very important and the loans so very achievable.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a great way for individuals to make a difference.

lender.name: Katie & Anthony
lender.loan_because: You always do what is right.
lender.occupational_info: work is work. Via Con Dios

lender.name: Anders
lender.occupational_info: Keeping the computers running and looking after users.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I am convinced of interest of micro-credit, being myself involved in a humanitarian structure (creation of network of alumni of Ecole Centrale Paris who are involved in humanitarian projects).

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: People like me living in the highest income countries have 86 percent of world Gross Domestic Product (GDP), 82 percent of world export markets, 68 percent of foreign direct investment and 74 percent of world telephone lines. Those living in the poorest countries share only one percent of any of these.
lender.occupational_info: I work with networked computer systems.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It just feels like the right thing to do.

lender.name: NEX
lender.loan_because: We strongly believe that these types of programs can be more effective than other types of charities. This is the case were you are encouraging the people to learn to fish instead of just giving them the fish.
lender.occupational_info: We build the software that help companies help people.

lender.name: Village School Foundation
lender.loan_because: As human beings we are constantly making choices every minute of every day either on a conscious or subconscious level. With the choices that we make, comes the responsibility for accepting what we experience in life. As children from poor villages of Viet Nam, did we choose poverty? As inmates in the only maximum-security prison in Oregon, did we choose to be locked up? In a world where children have no choices and where people made wrong choices collide, we’re here to keep hope alive. We want to share with KIVA that with a little bit of hope the world can be a better place. In prison we maybe – but imprisoned we are not.

lender.name: Tracy, Curt, & Jim
lender.occupation: Tracy is an RN; Curt & Jim are retired
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have traveled in South America and feel connected to the people.
lender.occupational_info: Tracy is Director of Nursing at a large extended care facility for seniors; Curt is a former public school teacher; Jim had formerly directed a state-wide network providing staff development and training, as well as legislative advocacy and education, regarding Adolescent Pregnancy and HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Heidrun Hlin
lender.loan_because: Hi, I loan because I love to be a helping hand(: I am a very fortunate person and I hope this help will make someone in need happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of two healthy boys.And I have been working in the same company for over 25 years now.

lender.name: marianne
lender.loan_because: I can!!!

lender.name: Dr Bob Haynes
lender.occupational_info: Large Animal (Cattle, Horses, Swine, Bison) Veterinarian as part of a mixed 3 doctor practice

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to thirve. ...and we are all ONE.
lender.occupational_info: I work on American films.

lender.name: RICARDO
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance...

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and want to help others realize success.
lender.occupational_info: I provide strategic advisory services to startup companies - helping them get from where they are to where they need to be.

lender.name: Gunnar
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an excellent approach to microlending.
lender.occupational_info: I teach statistics and apply it in research projects such as marine science and molecular biology.

lender.name: devata
lender.loan_because: I can and they need and someone is making the transaction possible.
lender.occupational_info: Information is very valuable and in some cases very sensitive too. I work in helping people and companies better understand and secure the information they create/use/access/share.

lender.name: Coledale 7CH
lender.loan_because: Every year my class raises money for charities by selling freezies! As you can see, our portfolio of loans increases every year!
lender.occupational_info: Coledale is a great school located in Unionville, Ontario, Canada!

lender.name: Mork
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving chances, not just giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a test engineer.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients plan for their future and reach their financial goals by offering them tailored solutions and investment options, in areas such as wealth accumulation, college savings, retirement planning, asset management, and estate planning.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because:
"We cannot seek achievement for ourselves and forget about progress and prosperity for our community...Our ambitions must be broad enough to include the aspirations and needs of others, for their sakes and for our own."
Cesar Chavez

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Every little helps.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and project management with an interest in sport and local community.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: i know what its like to be in need. and no one helps you. When you help others you help yourself. I know what its like to go hungry, or do without. because i been doing without most of my life.
lender.occupational_info: just basic labor, like all labor jobs. little pay hard work.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: everybody should pitch in

lender.name: Diver
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; and you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime."_Chinese proverb

lender.name: Cecilly
lender.loan_because: I'm choosing to stop standing aside and saying "Why doesn't anyone do anything to fix this?"
lender.occupational_info: I actually am a Dental Assistant, I just clean up the labs and sterilize the tools. Also, I am currenty a senior in High Scool, I will continue on to college when I graduate.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: Happy People make a Happier World.

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: I believe that I can help to change and impact the business owners world. By lending to those who will work hard for themselves and their communities I know that I will help to increase the productivity and ideals of third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent insurance agent whom focuses on individuals and small business. I provide many services including Property and Casualty Insurance, Life and Health Insurance, Retirement and Estate Planning, and Business Planning.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: Computer Equipment, new and used ALSO Water Conservation Products and Services

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people become independent, successful, and happy.
lender.occupational_info: I write checks to pay all the bills sent to the company I work for. When I'm not working, I like to read, write, knit, and listen to great music.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to help me help myself. I think it is important and good Karma.
lender.occupational_info: Day Job Director of Medical records Also I sell AVON!

lender.name: The Dee Family
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves an opportunity to better their life. This site provides a wonderful opportunity to connect those looking for that chance with others that are able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Superintendent of Schools in a District in Northern New York.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: It's part of me serving purpose in this lifetime, whether it be sending a message through the music i compose or contributing to these people's needs across the country. A little help in hand can make a big change in eliminating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: "Do not be deceived, God is not mocked; for whatever a man sows, that he will reap. For he who sows to his flesh will of the flesh reap corruption, but he who sows to the Spirit will of the Spirit reap everlasting life. And let us not grow weary while doing good, for in due season we shall reap if we do not lose heart" (Gal. 6:7-9).

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: you have to give in life to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work in healthcare, making it safer for everyone.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I felt it was a good idea to help someone else. I just graduated from Nursing School at the age of 50. If it was not for loans and an understanding family it would not have been possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a very large hospital in Phoenix, Arizona. I work in the Pediatric Intensive Care Unit taking care of very sick children.

lender.name: Thang Q. Tran
lender.loan_because: I left Viet Nam in 1980 and became one of the "boat people" who had received helps from many people.

lender.name: Entrepreneurs 121
lender.loan_because: Kids CAN Change The World!!!
lender.occupational_info:
ADEN FOREVER We are middle school students at St. Lawrence School near Montreal, Quebec. KIVA is our project which was begun to honour the memory of a young boy called ADEN ROACH who passed away several years ago at the age of 8 years old. Aden was a particularly good-hearted little boy, so we decided that KIVA was a good way to honour his memory. We blog about KIVA and other things at: http://allthingsquebec.wordpress.com/
If you're a teacher you may also be interested in my lesson plans . at: www.kivapedia.org/index.php/Main_Page/Education
Evelyn Yvonne Theriault

lender.name: Ólína
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Robinson Guillermo
lender.loan_because: I need building a business our for me, in Ecuador is very difficult access to loans, I wanna money for repair computers and put a cyber with internet and calling service for voip.
lender.occupational_info: I`m technology in computers, mantenance and repairs, teach of computers, and more..!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I like to take leaps of faith. Others have helped me in times of need. Small deeds go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and mentor adult students to become radiologic technologists (take X rays).

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Trainer at The Chariot Group, inc.
lender.loan_because: instead of donating to charity in under privileged countries, how about we lend? This website is awesome! It allows anyone to lend. Rather than throwing money into South Africa etc., why not use your money to help them build up their society so they can eventually stand on their own. Pretty cool idea. Not charity, just a hand up
lender.occupational_info: My company installs business meeting rooms. I train/teach the users how the equipment works.

lender.name: dillon
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide people with the same financial opportunities that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning to be a school teacher.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to help people help themselves! I love the concept!
lender.occupational_info: I help customers find technology to increase business and help them worker faster and smarter.

lender.name: Computer Magic Training
lender.loan_because: Encouraging entrepreneurialism is crucial to reducing poverty and increasing self-esteem and peace in the world. And because one person CAN.
lender.occupational_info: Our organization promotes learning of computer skills, as well as the personal and professional development skills, that help individuals and organizations to be highly successful.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: Empowering women in other countries is the key to long term peace in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising 2 boys, ages 7 and 10. I also work in schools helping kids who have problems handling their emotions and behavior.

lender.name: Emil
lender.loan_because: I hope that the future generations will live in a much equalitarian world
lender.occupational_info: I´m and engineer/philisopher...who knows what it means?

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: because its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: doctor

lender.name: Yehudi
lender.loan_because: This is a part of my Jewishness. It feels good to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Lightlife
lender.loan_because: I once received a loan from a stranger that gave me the chance to change my life. In return she asked only that I "pass it on."

lender.name: Nick and Mary
lender.loan_because: We have so many gifts, we must share. We are, after all, one world.
lender.occupational_info: We make aircraft that fly all around the world. Perhaps you see them flying overhead!

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to go further.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the telephone company repairing phone lines.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I know what a difference it makes when others believe in you.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I'm rich, biatch!

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, and help people who want to better themselves, and make a difference in their world!

lender.name: Suzanne B.
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you just need people to have a little faith in you! A few years ago a very good friend gave me the opportunity to start loaning to Kiva and it's stayed with me ever since.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that through innovation, persistence, and a willingness to take risks, anyone can improve their life. I've been fortunate to have many opportunities and I want to share that with those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I develop manufacturing systems and strategies in a silicon wafer factory.

lender.name: Sulsa
lender.loan_because: I like helping.
lender.occupational_info: Risk management.

lender.name: Satadru
lender.loan_because:
"for their efforts to create economic and social development from below" -- Nobel Foundation on Grameen Bank & Muhammad Yunus.
I believe Kiva has a similar potential and it is satisfying to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance risk management with a leading property & casualty insurance company in US.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: one small step for me... one giant step for someone else

lender.name: Harold and Paola
lender.loan_because: To honor the memory of our granparents Raquel Endara, Emilio Melendez, Alberto Abarca, Piedad Abarca and Fanny Godoy.
lender.occupational_info: Harold is a Mortgage Broker and Paola is the Director of a Non for Profit Organization.

lender.name: Vaibhav
lender.loan_because: I can. It is great that someone as small as I can make a difference as large as this,
lender.occupational_info: I make software, the stuff that runs on computers and on the internet.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: A friend gave me the gift of "gift giving". And from that I learned more about this great organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers... and try to help people solve their problems so that they can enjoy their computer experience without frustration.

lender.name: Madeleine
lender.loan_because: there but for the grace of god go I.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Japan and teach English to Japanese children.

lender.name: Michael Jones
lender.loan_because: I don't want to be greedy.

lender.name: Jim Olenbush
lender.loan_because: I like helping entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I own a real estate company in Austin, Texas. We have a team of agents that help clients buy and sell luxury homes in the area.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Its a great feeling being able to help out , the saying goes "every little bit helps"

lender.name: Federico
lender.loan_because: I want to make a diference
lender.occupational_info: I have a company that sells and rents Electrical Generators.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a theater company dedicated to representing Asian Americans authentically.

lender.name: Joyti
lender.loan_because: The best investment you can make in life is to help someone else's life.

lender.name: Pasi
lender.occupation: Civil servant a t a ministry

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: we're supposed to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: Realtor, Delta Pilot, Reserve Naval Aviator
lender.loan_because: I am extremely fortunate to have a healthy family, an education, and own my own company. Not everyone starts on equal ground and Kiva is an attempt to provide that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I have been buying and selling homes for people (and myself) for over eighteen years. Real estate fascinates me. Additionally, I am a pilot and get to travel all over my country and the world. I have visited a few of the countries represented on Kiva.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops medical devices for orthopedic surgery.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: Jennifer Karlen of REMAX Properties East in Louisville KY helps persons buy and sell Kentucky horse farms, land, equestrian real estate, homes, houses.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: Jon Karlen of REMAX Properties East is partnered with his wife Jennifer and helps persons buy and sell Kentucky horse farms, land, equestrian real estate, homes, houses, and other Louisville KY real estate.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I am struggling in this world and I know others are as well. I feel that I should help others which will in turn allow me to be fulfilled knowing that I have at least made one life better in my time. I am not in the best position financially to be giving out money but, I am helping someone who will in turn help many others which is more than enough.

lender.name: Ngan Le
lender.loan_because: I want to buy something for my studying. I'm building my shop also.
lender.occupational_info: My shop is for student like me. Everything you need, I have and I sell. That's all !

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great idea to share and feel fortunate that I can

lender.name: Guna
lender.loan_because: I want to empower the needy. Kiva lets me provide capital to people who are willing to work hard but do not have access to traditional loans.

lender.name: Corinna
lender.loan_because: I love business, big or small!

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very easy thing I can do to help some people out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Bell Canada - a telecommunications company.

lender.name: SHARON
lender.loan_because: I loan to honor my daughter who died at such a young age, she and I talked all the time about helping people when we could. She had such wonderful dreams of helping people I know that she would want to do this as much as I. She never turned her back on someone in need and she would have given anything she had, if she thought it would help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am just someone who cares and am glad if I can help someone in their time of need or to follow a dream.

lender.name: Cherie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to do so.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I see microfinance as an effective tool to reduce poverty worldwide.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life, both in family and opportunity. It is wonderful to be able to share some of what I have been given with others.

lender.name: Lin
lender.loan_because: kiva makes it effortless.
lender.occupational_info: I make portrait documentaries and narrative fiction.

lender.name: Shoko
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Mark and Larissa
lender.loan_because: we can

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I loan to help spread the love of God and his Son Jesus Christ. To show God does still care and because I know what is like to be in need and also to have a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I breed pekingese dogs and sell the puppies. I enjoy caring for both the dogs and the puppies, and helping the little guys into the world. I also love seeing the puppies get new homes and the Joy they bring to other peoples lives.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I hope to leave the world a better place. Fighting poverty, on even a limited basis, will help.
lender.occupational_info: Accountant.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I help companies and law firms evaluate patents and technologies, and perform transfer pricing. I also do reverse engineering of products.

lender.name: Payam
lender.loan_because: The ultimate goal in my life is to do the same thing Kiva is doing now, though with a twist.
lender.occupational_info: Senior in College, going to be a Banker someday!

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: God has incredibly blessed me above and beyond my daily needs. He calls on us to reach out to those less fortunate as a means of sharing His love.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to be able to stay at home and care for the needs of my family and minister to others.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of joining with other people across the world to make someone's life better.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories featuring Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck for their comic books.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I sit behind a desk all day programing a computer. Kinda boring.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to live their dreams!

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I'm a Miniature Schnauzer, I don't need the money.
lender.occupational_info: Hmmm, where to start. I bark a lot when someone knocks on the door or comes near the house, but I don't bite. I enjoy being Mom's "stress reliever." I'm from Oklahoma and I'm a huge OU football fan - go Sooners!

lender.name: Kitty
lender.loan_because: I have all I need and believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for development of new business for my global company. When we are awarded a new contract I travel to whatever country it is in and live in that culture to start up the new office. This has given me a respect and appreciation for other cultures and the people of the world.

lender.name: Lin & Jerry
lender.loan_because: we are paying it forward.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people who are much less fortunate than myself and are under-served by the traditional banking/financial community.

lender.name: Rick & Karen
lender.loan_because: It's a simple and easy way to help people.

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I operate the heart-lung machine during heart surgery.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are less fortunate.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I write software and books to do with Irish heritage and family history.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's important that everyone should be permitted to retain and grow their self-esteem and take pride in their achievements
lender.occupational_info: I try to encourage people to take responsibility for their own health and wellbeing.

lender.name: Jamijeff
lender.occupational_info: I help people get together and fight their bosses for more of the product of their labor.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: We believe you can make a difference in people's lives by helping them, help themselves. This breaks the cycle of poverty in developing countries.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: My church is involved in a project called Millenium Development Goals which aims to relieve poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help adults complete their college education.

lender.name: Ana Lewis
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit that lives within us all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business owner, along with my husband, in our Web Design firm. We employ about 20 people located all over the world and like the global entity that the WWW represents.

lender.name: Biswajit
lender.loan_because: It is an excellent way to assist people in small business and help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Disaster Relief Fund
lender.loan_because: when natural disasters occur, a business loan can be a step toward recovery.
lender.occupational_info: Funds given to the Disaster Relief Fund via Kiva credit can be sent to disasterrelieffund@yahoo.com

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Empowering entrepreneurs and small businesses is the end-game to our evolving consciousness and global economic development.
lender.occupational_info: We provide personal development and business products for Hispanic entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Smith Clan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to change their life for the better. By giving a little we can directly help someone make a positive impact in their life.
lender.occupational_info: One is a computer geek, one is in charge of the children, and 2 play, learn and have fun.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I spent my summer in Kenya and I saw first hand how Kiva has helped people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Ian and Francesca
lender.loan_because: They would if the situations were reversed.
lender.occupational_info: Ian lends money to not-for-profit organizations like Kiva so they can help as many people as possible. Francesca is a children's doctor.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: God has graced me with more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of software and hardware developers, eliminating manufacturing waste.

lender.name: Fayruz
lender.loan_because: I am interested in micro-finance and ingenious, grassroots solutions to world poverty that connect people and businesses around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am completing a BBA degree with a specialist in Management at the University of Toronto (Canada) and I hope to work in the fields of micro-finance and Islamic finance once I've graduated.

lender.name: barbichon_of_mine
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to be able to.

lender.name: Brad and Ellen
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: Collin
lender.loan_because: I love people! Jesus said love God and love people, and that's what I try to do every day!
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning to be a pilot.

lender.name: Kurt Maddox
lender.loan_because: As an advocate of Conscious Capitalism, I believe that private person-to-person finance holds tremendous potential to help develop a profitable class of small businesses inside developing countries while giving the individual investor a way to engage the developing world and play a direct role in the success of a third world entrepreneur. Best of all, once my microloan has been repaid, I get to give it over and over and over again! If there's ever been such a thing as a gift that keeps on giving -- THIS IS IT!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an executive w/ a small tech company and a real estate entrepreneur.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I love to help others in times of need, and I love to see businesses thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate business student at Georgia State University.

lender.name: JULIE-ANN
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to help others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I own a farm & cow/calf operation. I am a retired nurse who now does volunteer work in the arts locally.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people who improve the lives in their community
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to sell their products and train their employees

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: It's my hope that it will help someone.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I like to believe in Karma, I also have been in great need, many times before. This is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I contract with used dealerships, and private auto owners for Complete auto detail services. I also do Domestic Carpet cleaning, and online sales.

lender.name: channam
lender.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh Quan Binh Thanh

lender.name: pierre
lender.loan_because: small streams make big rivers
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a translation company.

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans are a great solution to enable people to become self-sufficient in their business.

lender.name: Jens-Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to make their lifes better.

lender.name: Hee Jeong
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help whenever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I provide potential and existing clients with growth strategies by identifying new business ideas, analyzing industry categories and developing new product concepts.

lender.name: Anja
lender.loan_because: I like to help

lender.name: Enrique
lender.loan_because: I can help to change someone's and their family's life
lender.occupational_info: I sell, install and support software for manufacturing facilities

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe that God has given me the chance to be a blessing to the people around me. An amount of money that is small for me can make a big difference in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach biology and physics to students at a charter school in the Fruitvale community of Oakland, CA.

lender.name: The Mundys
lender.loan_because: We all have more than most. What we do with the more, means the most.
lender.occupational_info:
Investment & Residential Real Estate. Check out my Blog: http://tinyurl.com/c3v2n2
www.SteelBentCustoms.com

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: it is the most wonderful thing I can do to help the world become a better place.

lender.name: Pau
lender.loan_because: I believe projects like Kiva can make a difference.

lender.name: Constance
lender.loan_because: I would like to support the efforts of women across the globe to better their lives and the lives of their children.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Well - I live in Italy and work for the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations in the Fisheries Department. We handle many aspects about Fisheries and one is creation of microfinancing for fishing activity in developing countries. This was the first time though that I have seen an opportunity to get personally involved and I was intrigued. It's great being able to conduct microfinance lending myself.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Oracle DBA and I also develop IT statistical systems for collecting, analyzing and reporting data for all kinds of fishing activity in developing countries.

lender.name: Christian John Evjen
lender.loan_because: I believe in individual initiative as a gift from God. Self reliance.
lender.occupational_info: Retired but work for enhancement of commerce and trade.

lender.name: Arpit
lender.loan_because: I know the difference it can bring in one's life!!

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people strive to create an improved life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior college student and I build information-product businesses on the Internet.

lender.name: Terry T
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: It seems I have too much. This is one of my favorite portfolios "So what do you think of the dealio so far?"

lender.name: Aaron - Edina Realty
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way for me to help share my success with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses, which impacts their daily lives. This is another way that I can improve peoples' daily lives.

lender.name: Karthik
lender.loan_because: Because I want to Start Of with A new Business,So that I can generate something for my country.
lender.occupational_info: Believe in team work,Management skills,Hard working

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Small moments, and movements, can swell into something extraordinary.

lender.name: Geribi snc
lender.loan_because: This idea is great!
lender.occupational_info: I produce and sell Italian hand painted ceramics.

lender.name: Sameer
lender.loan_because: Giving is beautiful and never empty your bank balance! $25 on a lavish lunch satisfies your stomach and may be your mind for just a couple of hours, instead lending the same amount to someone for their living, will certainly satisfy your soul till the end of your life.

lender.name: McG family
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help others have opportunities and a chance at a better life. Kiva provides a 'hand up' not just a 'hand out' - wonderful.

lender.name: Jason and Lisa
lender.loan_because: we want to shine some light at the end of the tunnel.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am able to do some small part to change and improve the world, the quality of someone's life and livelihood. It feels good to be contributing in this way. I'm blessed in many ways, I want to give back to others because I can.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility to help those less fortunate than ourselves. However, simply giving aid will only provide a crutch for many people who receive it. The best way to help people succeed in life is to help them economically. That is why I loan and am a supporter of the Fair Trade Movement.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: Searching for the right location to open a craft brew pub.

lender.name: Lesa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: anita
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. besides, i know matt and jessica and they play a mean game of cranium!
lender.occupational_info: i freelance as a video/film producer for corporate and commercial clients.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
I like people who take responsibility and I foster entrepreneurship (self-reliance).
(That critter is an "Aye Aye".)
lender.occupational_info: Help create visions of what can be accomplished, and then helping to make them so.

lender.name: Clarisse
lender.loan_because: giving a hand is easy though Kiva. The hardest work has still to be done: making business grow and people live better.
lender.occupational_info: I participate in the regulation of pesticides, trying to identify the most useful for agriculture without any risk for human health.

lender.name: a.j
lender.loan_because: ive been following it for a few years (much before kiva came along) and i think its the best way to help development.
lender.occupational_info: i ensure that the finance department is doing their job..

lender.name: Srivalli Paramathmuni
lender.loan_because: I want to support the needy.

lender.name: Dan & Bev
lender.loan_because: We are glad to loan money to people who need it. We hope it makes a positive difference and adds some joy to their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We sell insurance for cars and homes. People pay money to our company. If they have an accident or their home is damage by a storm or fire, we pay for the repairs.

lender.name: David & Yin
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who want to help themselves and others, specially if they create new jobs in the community.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: It's one small step for me, but may be one giant leap for the entrepreneur

lender.name: Guillermo
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do

lender.name: Pétur Þ Pétursson
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: A great feeling to help others. As an owner of my own business I know how hard it is to keep things going.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of a hobby/toy store. Right now I only work 3 days a week ...semi retired. But I work on our website almost every day...keeping prices current and new items on.

lender.name: Philoscribe
lender.loan_because: I care. And, I think the way Kiva works is just great. It makes it possible for me to do something practical to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: I hope that in some small way that I can make a difference in someone elses life.

lender.name: Record Misfit
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand... what a beautiful gift to be able to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: In front of a computer.... all the time.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: It's simply great to have the opportunity to help people in making their own life financially better in the context of a project THEY build.
lender.occupational_info: Well simply advising companies and individuals about tax matters in Belgium.

lender.name: Dean Jarrett
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful idea and I feel I'm doing something very, very positive!

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help others in need, especially those who want to help themselves and need assistance reaching their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring people to the city I live so they can experience our museums and attractions.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: These loans are not much trouble for me, but they are very helpful to others. That is a good deal. Thank kiva for making it possible.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can and one candle can light the darkness...
lender.occupational_info: I teach my boys at home, I help people finish their photo albums, I help my mom who has dementia.

lender.name: Koji
lender.loan_because: To help people get a chance to accomplish their goals and to be happy.
lender.occupational_info: Newstone International specializes in importing natural stone raw materials and finished products around the world. Materials are processed in China,India,Brazil, and Japan to be offered on our online store on Amazon.co.jp and Rakuten. Portion of our profit are either donated or loaned to association, such as MAC Tokyo, Red Cross, or cities of victims of 3.11 Tsunami.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I like to provide the opportunity to succeed and be rewarded for hard work and effort.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a flight attendant for 30 years and I fly international to many countries around the world.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think that donations like the ones you and I are making really contribute to the hope for eliminating poverty around the world $25 at time. Be proud. I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the 8th grade. I am getting a great catholic education.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I like that my money has gone directly to an individual to help them make a better life for themselves. It feels good!!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and businesses.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I feel like a make a difference.

lender.name: Kegs
lender.loan_because: Keg's wants everyone to have a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make their dreams come true! I like to support and encourage people's creativity.
lender.occupational_info: I help groups of people work together in more effective and creative ways.

lender.name: CJ & Rye
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help...
lender.occupational_info: We help make sure new medicines are safe to use.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I love the combination of social justice and free enterprise-- great investment in the most important things of all.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college classes about elections and government.

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves an opportunity and continous encouragement to follow their deams

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: I'd like to believe that we can help each other without funding big companies in the process.
lender.occupational_info: I talk to people about words and books!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of being able to make such a difference to peoples lives with a micro loan and the people have such incredible stories and tales.
lender.occupational_info: I use paint, pastel and charcoal to transform blank canvas and paper into luscious color and visual delights.

lender.name: Lukas
lender.loan_because: Hope this little money could make someone smile.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping companies to grow their business.

lender.name: Mahmood Hassan
lender.occupational_info: I am a UK based entrepreneur with diversified business and social interests. My own experiences of being born and brought up in some of the deprived areas of Pakistan ultimately led me establish Islamic Aid www.islamicaid.org.uk a charity helping change the world one life at a time. I am also trustee of Practical Action. www.practicalaction.org With an annual turnover of £25 million, Practical Action's work is aimed at alleviation of poverty through technology, a cause very close to my heart.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I love these people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their lives.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: "We cannot all do great things, but we can do small things with great love." --Mother Teresa

lender.name: Drown Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help others. This is a great way for the average person to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: JOSEPH
lender.loan_because: When I went in to business, I had certain people take a risk with me. Now I am returning the favor.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I feel that I can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. There are so many people that just need a chance and if I can help them, then I must.

lender.name: Braulio
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my obligation to help the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Im a student at Texas Tech University. My major is Petrolem Engineering

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to improve their lives through hard work

lender.name: Riki
lender.occupational_info: sculptor involved in deep ecology

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Because i believe in the values promoted by the system of the micro-credits, and that it's the best way to help people in need, rather than trying to force them to follow the schema's we had to use to evolve.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to help others to work better, and more efficiently.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: What a better way to make peace all over the world. Give a man a fish you feed him for a day. Teach him to fish you feed him for the rest of his life
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of assisted living communities in Texas

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: there is nothing more beautiful than someone's dream of what they could do with just a little help.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to try to make their lives better through hard work and following their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Guy

lender.name: TheMidasTouch2007
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate than myself. I have visited countries where the infrastructure for business isn't there, and I saw the people need allot of help in other countries so I hope I can help a little but to these people I know it means allot. I hope other people will help also, and I am sure these people here are grateful for everyone's contributions.
lender.occupational_info: I am in college for finance/accounting a duel major and I plan to open my own business in 7-10 yrs after working in my chosen career.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupation: President/CEO Asian Pacific Chamber of Commerce

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I like to think of myself as having an entrepreneurial spirit; by lending money to entrepreneurs in developing countries I can vicariously live the dream. I really hope these businesses succeed - I hope I send goodwill as well as money.

lender.name: David, Anne, Emil, Anya
lender.loan_because: We like to support farmers, musicians, and other workers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Anne teaches piano, and has a group of talented and dedicated students. David is interested in agriculture and forestry, and the effect of humans on earth system function. Emil likes to sing, ride his bicycle, and play with balls. Anya eats, sleeps, poops, and loves.

lender.name: Martha Club
lender.loan_because: We can. It helps people, which makes the world a better place. It feels great. It's fun!

lender.name: scott
lender.occupational_info: fix and repair machines that make computer chips

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Even living in a small studio in SF, I realize just how rich I really am.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in a great transition of moving from the fashion industry into volunteer management.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves... and I really like the tranparency provided by the web site.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I would like to provide opportunity to others.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: many people have helped me throughout my life, and I know how important it can be to have someone help you. I want to be able to use the fruits of my fortune to help those who haven't been as lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company and review the contracts they sign to make sure the employees have information about the risks they face and are protected. I also research the law and help members of the company understand what the law means to them, what its effects are.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people (from any part of the world) the opportunity to create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a master's degree in business.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students and their families, providing academic and personal counseling, college and career preparation, etc.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care.
lender.occupational_info: A sincere, arduous spritual practitioner.

lender.name: Michael & Ruth
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to help individuals around the world and share in their success.

lender.name: John Ramirez
lender.loan_because: Every penny counts.

lender.name: Isador
lender.loan_because: It is the least that I can do to help those who have not had the good fortune that I have enjoyed. Hopefully what little I give will be seed money to help people help themselves to escape the misery of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: My "been there, done that" list is too long; I am 76 years old. But it has been a good life and I hope that whatever time is left for me will enable me to enable others to live such a good life.

lender.name: Kelley & Ryan
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have both been business owners at one point in our lives and believe that it takes help from others to make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: As graphic designers, we work in print, packaging and web to create a variety of media.

lender.name: Even
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism and the private initiative. I hope for a richer, healthier and happier world.

lender.name: Vanessa & Bart
lender.loan_because: We don't do enough of this

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate from my brother for my birthday--my favorite gift ever. I believe this is the type of innovative and globally conscious thinking that is exactly what we need in the world right now. I'm so excited I could give!

lender.name: Universal Sisters
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care,and believe that everyone should have to opportunity to live their dreams, as well as have the resources to care for themselves and their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: We at Universal Sisters are a group of friends and sisters that have come together through our dream to share with others.Universal Creations is a company run by Jen Taylor who is the sole artist and manufacturer of wearable goods and art. Sister's and Co. is a boutique and salon owned by 4 sisters located in The Shops of Wailea. Since all the girls are living their dreams we have come together to give so others may live theirs. Much love and Aloha to all who have contributed and we look forward to giving more.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I have many blessings and want to share.
lender.occupational_info: President ~ Owner Marketing Co. that sources, sells and service theme parks across the US.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: I can. $25 a month out of my pocket is no hardship, so I am lending that money through Kiva to people who can put it to much better use than I would.
lender.occupational_info: I do massage therapy. I use my hands and energy to relax and heal people throughout my hometown of Phoenix, Arizona.

lender.name: Rich & Suzanne
lender.loan_because: '... whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.'--Matt. 25:40

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: We are challenged to look beyond our own parish boundaries to effect positive change in the world. This loan, small in my world, is a huge step in the world of another. How can we NOT loan?
lender.occupational_info: With 3 children, my life is like most mothers as we all strive to provide the best possible up-bringing for our children. I am fortunate to be in a place where I have adequate means and help to do so - and we are here at Kiva to help those that do not.

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people, like so many have done for me.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because:
Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed in their chosen field. It's easy to provide the smallest amount needed for any business to grow - especially for those in the developing world, where resources and funding for such things are lacking.
For me, it's no pain, but so much (for others in need) to gain.
P.S. I AM NOT GIVING FOR MY OWN GOOD NOR FOR A FEELING OF SELF-WORTH.
I am giving because I CAN and I WANT to help.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to make help someone who is in need of some money to start their business. I will be opening my own dental practice someday and realize that it's not an easy task even in America with good credit to start your business. Just want to help people who need some help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student currently working as an office administrator for the US Veterans' Dep.

lender.name: Willy & Jeana
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and although doing the right thing is not always easy and not always convenient there is a wonderful sense of well being in being selfless.
lender.occupational_info: ...say that fast 20 times.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I am an entreprenuer and know the importance of raising capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am a recent graduate of Northwestern University in Chicago. I now run my own online music company called Next Big Sound

lender.name: Shiro
lender.loan_because:
I feel very fortunate for what I have. A lot has been shared with me by family and friends over the years: time, love, a shoulder, a helping hand, beer, humor, and patience.
I give because I think of those who have been truly selfless in helping me... and it makes it all worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an agent of change and an advocate for sustainable living. I am not a tree hugger (cactus = pain) but I am a proponent for making HUGE and MEANINGFUL strides towards Environmental, Economic and Social Sustainability!

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: "Microloans" have allowed me to help break the cycle of poverty in places very far away where I might not normally have the opportunity to make a difference. Microloans work miracles in peoples' lives!
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organizations to be more successful in achieving results. I am a project management generalist. I have subject matter expertise in IT, Information Security, Business Continuity / Disaster Planning, Human Capital Management, and Not-for-Profit Governance.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: "Never walk away from someone who deserves help; your hand is God's hand for that person." Proverbs 3:27

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing assistance to hard-working people.
lender.occupational_info: A scientist by training, a manager at professional firms involved in research and development in the pharmaceutical industry, and an entrepreneur by interest.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: My dad often quotes the following, "Do all the good you can., to all the people you can."
lender.occupational_info: I work in community relations and charitable giving for a large company.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I support small, disadvantaged businesses and entrepreneurs. I love the idea of microloans enabling people to move toward economic viability. Also, as a global citizen it's our duty to roll up our sleeves every once in a while and help our neighbors out.
lender.occupational_info: Full service concierge company offering "the gift of time" for the busy professional, college student, parent, patient, business, and more. I love helping people and making a difference in someone else's life. If I can ease someone's burden by tackling obstacles and tasks that they don't have time or resources for then I consider my job worthwhile and meaningful. I long to be fulfilled.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because:
I am a business owner myself and I can't think of a more empowering gift to give someone !
I love to travel and love helping people from other areas .
lender.occupational_info: I market my photography. I do my photography. My clients are happy. They refer me to their friends.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I believe in you
lender.occupational_info: I do technologies that help doctors in developing countries, for example helping pregnant women report complications via SMS; and for disaster response.

lender.name: Mårten
lender.loan_because: It seems like an excellent common sense-based way of helping people. It doesn't only rely on altruism, but more on a possible win-win relationship.

lender.name: Ershadul
lender.loan_because: i wants to start IT Higher Diploma Schooling in my Homeland. Its a big project.
lender.occupational_info: My self. coz, i'm a IT professional. I understand, this field is more successful if i continure by your help.

lender.name: Satish
lender.occupational_info: Business Consultant/Counsellor

lender.name: Mohammad
lender.loan_because: I feel it will make an impact to the global poverty when joined with other small lenders like me.
lender.occupational_info: I am associated with the petroleum/ oil and gas industry.

lender.name: Deepak
lender.loan_because: I want Loan to start a new business
lender.occupational_info: I want to start a chain of a totlly new type of Automobile ventures in India. This venture will cater the needs of the vehicles from various companies under one roof. There is no such venture anywhere in India.

lender.name: Carin
lender.loan_because: This is what it is all about, isn't it? Pay it forward.....

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good way to help people help themself...

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to improve their lives and to achieve a decent income through their own work and enterprise. Along with my money I send my very best wishes and luck to the recipients.
lender.occupational_info: I trade the prices of sporting events much the same as others trade financial products. I am fortunate to have 6 brilliant children and work from home to allow me to look after the youngest three on my own.

lender.name: Helena and Pontus
lender.loan_because: We think this is an excellent opportunity to put our money to good use and support people with good projects in need.
lender.occupational_info: We have two children and both work in the computer software industry with software design and development.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: Because I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work with a group of dedicated specialists with focus on life sciences

lender.name: GatewayBaltic
lender.loan_because: We believe that small contributions can make big changes. We ourselves started our company in an incubator and recived infrastructure support in the start up phase.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Gateway for businesses entering Baltic states and an opening for Baltic companies to international markets.

lender.name: Richard Kohlhagen
lender.loan_because: When life gives you lemonade, share it around
lender.occupational_info: I'm happy, life is good.

lender.name: ghulam
lender.loan_because: I m very poor guy, and last four year I m suffering to any job but still I m not successful bcz as u know in this world no one can live without money plz give me loan of US$1000 , I m very thankful to u. I m also convert my FIRQA OR OCCUPATION and now i m sunni, but I knows no body can help me bcz as all in their own life but if any sunni people who read my this profile so pzl conntact me plz bcz I m very needy this time.
lender.occupational_info: I m starting business of garments bcz I have lots of expereince of textile field.

lender.name: Pinaki & Madhu
lender.loan_because: We believe that it is best when people help themselves. Sometimes they need a little helping hand. That's alll...

lender.name: Lilian
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people getting independent and that Kiva makes it so easy to give a loan.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to develop entrepreneurship in developing countries and support local economies.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a sales team of over 200 sales people across the country. They provide businesses with the ability to accept credit cards as a form of payment from customers for goods and services.

lender.name: Nina 仁那
lender.loan_because: I want the world to become a better place for more people and this is a great oppurtunity to participate. Empowering people is the most efficient means.

lender.name: Weissenrieder family
lender.loan_because: We should and we can.

lender.name: Patrik
lender.loan_because: There's more than enough poverty in the world and I'm better off than the majority of people on this globe. I prioritize short loans, keeping the velocity of money high.
lender.occupational_info:
Goals for next 12 months ( as set on mar 30th, 2011): Slowly but steadily add funds up to a total of $1000 ($430). Make 125 loans in total (49).
Method: Currently getting repayment of around $80-90 per month. This means lending out atleast $150 or six loans per month to keep pace, probably up to $175 by mid summer and $200 by mid fall.

lender.name: Ola
lender.loan_because: A small donation to give a chance for a better life in the future.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I create things for companies on the internet.

lender.name: Maud and Patrik
lender.loan_because: We care. It is really great to be able to help others in this way. Thank you!
lender.occupational_info: Maud is a Spiritual Energy Painter and Reconnective Healer practitioner. Patrik works as a Certified Neurosemantics and NLP Trainer.

lender.name: Ping
lender.loan_because: it empowers the people, opening them up to possibilities. and more importantly, it supports dreams, that everyone should be entitled to. And it sure feels good to bring them a step closer to realising them. Or at least, offers a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Lovely to be protecting public interest on paper. Certainly hope to do the groundwork one day.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: There is a need and I can help and I feel it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure the aircraft components that we service for our customers are safe and reliable, so folks can get to where they are going when they fly.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I want to assist entrepreneurs in other countries in establishing and growing their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney. My practice areas are criminal defense and family law.

lender.name: Erich
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers at a university.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: In my heart I believe that we each have the power to help others reach their potential. Problems in one part of the world affect us all, whether or not we realize it. As Margaret Meade said, "If we are to achieve a richer culture, rich in contrasting values, we must recognize the whole gamut of human potentialities, and so weave a less arbitrary social fabric, one in which each diverse human gift will find a fitting place."
lender.occupational_info: I work for Habitat for Humanity. I help poor people in America own their own homes so that they can break out of the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because: I love the work that non-profit organizations like "Kiva" are doing to help people across the world...with alittle love, compassion, and unity we CAN lift each other up. Bless.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Georgia State University earning a degree in Anthropology and Geography. I also work part-time waiting tables in a well-established restaurtant in Atlanta. But my real work is trying to help change the world through one act of love at a time :) Another world is possible!

lender.name: Matteus
lender.loan_because: I am a huge fan of the "fishing-pole instead-of-the-fish-theory"
lender.occupational_info: I sell transport-services in Europe

lender.name: Ionie
lender.loan_because: to raise my capital in cellphone loading business.
lender.occupational_info: my work is very challenging specially that i am dealing with different nationality,age,personality and the reason itself of studying the English Language. But it is full of fun too.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Wilton
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea. I really get the feeling I'm helping people make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adults in Hamburg, Germany.

lender.name: Quinn Family
lender.loan_because: We are blessed in so many ways and are thrilled to be able to help others to provide for their families and better their lives.

lender.name: GlendaM
lender.loan_because: No matter what our struggle, for most of us in North America we have access to every opportunity in life. There are many in the world that do not have the same access. We all make a difference to the world by what we do individually. I think this is an amazing opportunity to make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: I spend quite a bit of time doing international volunteer work online - mostly helping with project management and grant and proposal writing. But my day job is in marketing.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It's the best way I know to fight global economic imbalance on a personal level, and because I believe in entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I look after all the details when my company wants to open new facilities or enter new businesses.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: Becoming financially self suficent through personal hard work and commitment is the only sure way out of poverty. By encouraging people to create jobs and businesses we will see the entire economic picture improve. By providing the capital to such people we are simply giving them one of the tools needed to create the jobs necessary to lift them all.
lender.occupational_info: I assist construction contractors in obtaining credit needed to obtain contracts.

lender.name: Volker
lender.loan_because: We, in the rich and wealthy part of the world, have the responsibility to support our sisters and brothers in the other parts of the world.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping other people is the best way to be succesfull

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing!

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computer all day long

lender.name: M. Lisa
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help those in less fortunate. It is also a small way that I can make a difference in little steps and I hope that because it is a manageable system financially (for me) that my friends and family (most of whom don't have much money either) can reflect on how they can see how we are so much better off and it is out obligation to care and put out money and hearts where our mouths are.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel like God has blessed me, and I should share what he has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of buildings and grounds at a church camp and conference center.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Just a good thing to do

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I have just had my bar-mitzvah
lender.occupational_info: school is hard

lender.name: Yin Family
lender.loan_because: kids can make a difference through this program!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Christ has provided my family a joy that leads me to share both the spiritual joy and the material goods in my life.

lender.name: karim
lender.loan_because: Helping people to realise their challenges
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to realise their challenges .... also !!!

lender.name: Mitch & Vanessa
lender.loan_because: We feel fortunate to be where we are at this point in our lives, and it gives us pleasure to be able to help someone who is hard working and just looking for an opportunity to succeed. Hoping to make a better world one little success at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Fire fighters show up when someone is possibly having the worst day of their lives. Whether it is a medical emergency, or other type of catatrophe, fire fighters work hard to help those in need put their lives back in order.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I ultimately want to help more people get a good education so that they can make improvements in the world around them.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university making DNA constructs and transfecting them into worms so that students can do research on endocytosis and membrane trafficking in cells.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: i have some money i don't use.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school in order to become a nurse.

lender.name: Sourabh
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower hardworking people to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I develop customized e-commerce business plans for companies around the world.
